hotels.title: Modern Vadodara City Break with Rooftop Pool & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover India's Vadodara from this stylish urban retreat, where modern comfort meets local charm. Well-appointed rooms offer a quiet escape, while the outdoor pool and fitness centre keep your routine refreshed. Treat yourself at the in-house patisserie or explore the hotel’s inviting restaurant, serving flavours from across India and beyond. Art, history and nature lovers will enjoy nearby gems like Laxmi Vilas Palace, Sayaji Baug and the Baroda Museum. For a day trip, the majestic Statue of Unity and the UNESCO-listed Champaner-Pavagadh archeological park awai exploration.
